channel.title: Problem with doors
channel.description:
i have all the code put in correctly, but my doors still aren't working like they should be. i've checked all the tutorials and threads, i did everything correctly, and they still don't work. i believe i'm working with a PI base, these are the codes that i have in:
doors.cfg - [code]/**the door starts as closed South 0 face = doorX -1 face = -3 East -1 face = doorY -1 face = 0 North -2 face = doorX +1 face = -1 West -3 face = doorY +1 face = -2 */ //door = xcoord ycoord height face shutoropen(0,1)
//Lumbridge door = 3234 3207 0 0 0 //regular door door = 3244 3216 0 -2 0 //chapel big door
door = 2510 3380 0 -1 0 //this is the door i'm trying to get to work door = 2510 3380 0 0 1 //this is the same door, but in the open position
[ENDOFDOORLIST] [/code]
and ActionHandler.java - [code]case 1530: case 1531: case 1533: case 1534: case 11712: case 11711: case 11707: case 11708: case 6725: case 3198: case 3197: Server.objectHandler.doorHandling(objectType, c.objectX, c.objectY, 0); break; [/code]
As you can see, i have added a case for the correct door i'm trying to use, 1530 (or 1531..but i have both added, and many other doors). The bummer is that the doors worked earlier, and i stupidly changed a bunch of stuff and forgot to save a backup before hand haha. Can anybody tell me what i'm doing wrong?

item.title: Problem with doors
item.dc:creator: @warrsaw warrsaw
item.description:
@warrsaw wrote:

i have all the code put in correctly, but my doors still aren’t working like they should be.
i’ve checked all the tutorials and threads, i did everything correctly, and they still don’t work.
i believe i’m working with a PI base, these are the codes that i have in:

doors.cfg -

[code]/**the door starts as closed
South 0 face = doorX -1 face = -3
East -1 face = doorY -1 face = 0
North -2 face = doorX +1 face = -1
West -3 face = doorY +1 face = -2
*/
//door = xcoord ycoord height face shutoropen(0,1)

//Lumbridge
door = 3234 3207 0 0 0 //regular door
door = 3244 3216 0 -2 0 //chapel big door

door = 2510 3380 0 -1 0 //this is the door i’m trying to get to work
door = 2510 3380 0 0 1 //this is the same door, but in the open position

[ENDOFDOORLIST]
[/code]

and ActionHandler.java -

case 1530: case 1531: case 1533: case 1534: case 11712: case 11711: case 11707: case 11708: case 6725: case 3198: case 3197: Server.objectHandler.doorHandling(objectType, c.objectX, c.objectY, 0); break;

As you can see, i have added a case for the correct door i’m trying to use, 1530 (or 1531…but i have both added, and many other doors). The bummer is that the doors worked earlier, and i stupidly changed a bunch of stuff and forgot to save a backup before hand haha.
Can anybody tell me what i’m doing wrong?

Read full topic
